pager.sql: select t_blog.id,t_blog.type,t_blog.user_id as userId,user.profile,user.nickname,t_blog.create_time as createTime,t_blog.article_id as articleId,t_blog.link,t_blog.photos,t_blog.num_of_likes as numOfLikes,t_blog.num_of_comments as numOfComments,t_blog.num_of_forwards as numOfForwards,t_blog.text from (select * from <%if({{rows}}) return '(select * from blog limit 0,{{rows}}) as temp'; else return 'blog'%> <%if({{pageSize}}) return 'limit #{pageOffset},#{pageSize}'%>) as t_blog left join user on t_blog.user_id=user.id <%if({{sort}}) return 'order by ${sort} ${order}'%>;

count.sql: select count(*) as count from blog
